yāayyuhā al-muzamilu
qumi al-layla illā qalīlan
niṣ'fahu awi unquṣ min'hu qalīlan
aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
innā sanul'qī ʿalayka qawlan thaqīlan
inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
inna laka fī al-nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlan
wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamīlan
wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
inna ladaynā ankālan wajaḥīman
waṭaʿāman dhā ghuṣṣatin waʿadhāban alīman
yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan ʿalaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir'ʿawna rasūlan
faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan

inna rabbaka yaʿlamu annaka taqūmu adnā min thuluthayi al-layli waniṣ'fahu wathuluthahu waṭāifatun mina alladhīna maʿaka wal-lahu yuqaddiru al-layla wal-nahāra ʿalima an lan tuḥ'ṣūhu fatāba ʿalaykum fa-iq'raū mā tayassara mina al-qur'āni ʿalima an sayakūnu minkum marḍā waākharūna yaḍribūna fī al-arḍi yabtaghūna min faḍli al-lahi waākharūna yuqātilūna fī sabīli al-lahi fa-iq'raū mā tayassara min'hu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aqriḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan wamā tuqaddimū li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidūhu ʿinda al-lahi huwa khayran wa-aʿẓama ajran wa-is'taghfirū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
